Uses of Interface
net.xqhs.flash.core.agent.Agent

  • Packages that use Agent 
    Package Description
    example.echoAgent
    A simple deployment, testing the deployment of very basic scenarios.
    example.simplePingPong
    The scenario of two agents which ping messages between them (one sends and one replies).
    example.webSocketsDeployment
    Verifies: correct functioning of the websockets support infrastructure, in three different loading contexts (manual deployment, with deployment configuration and simple agents, and with deployment configuration and composite agents).
    net.xqhs.flash.core.agent.java
    Package containing classes related to the deployment of Java agents in Flash-MAS.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.composite
    The package contains classes related to the implementation ofCompositeAgent.
    net.xqhs.flash.core.shard
    The package contains interfaces and abstract classes for core agent features.

    • Uses of Agent in net.xqhs.flash.core.agent.java

      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.agent.java that implement Agent 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  JavaAgent
      This class marks the fact that an extending agent implementation is created ad-hoc; it does not offer any pre-implemented functionality.

    • Uses of Agent in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite

      Classes in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite that implement Agent 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  CompositeAgent
      This class implements an agent formed by shards and an event queue that allows shards to communicate among each other.
      Fields in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite with type parameters of type Agent 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Entity.EntityProxy<Agent> CompositeAgent.asContext
      The proxy to this agent.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite that return Agent 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Agent CompositeAgentLoader.load​(MultiTreeMap agentConfiguration)
      This method calls CompositeAgentLoader.load(MultiTreeMap, List, List).
      Agent CompositeAgentLoader.load​(MultiTreeMap agentConfiguration, java.util.List<Entity.EntityProxy<? extends Entity<?>>> context, java.util.List<MultiTreeMap> subordinateEntities)
      The method loads all the information necessary for the creation of an agent and returns an Agent instance used to manage the life-cycle of the loaded agent.
      Methods in net.xqhs.flash.core.composite that return types with arguments of type Agent 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Entity.EntityProxy<Agent> CompositeAgent.asContext()  

    • Uses of Agent in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard

      Method parameters in net.xqhs.flash.core.shard with type arguments of type Agent 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean AgentShardCore.addContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<Agent> parent)
      Setter for the parent agent.
      boolean AgentShardCore.removeContext​(Entity.EntityProxy<Agent> parent)
      Sets the parent of the shard to null, effectively eliminating the shard from the agent.
